data.prayer: Father, help the 17,669 believers in Tsuen Wan to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 271,030 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 17,669 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next week to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 288,700 citizens of the the state of Tsuen Wan.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Tsuen Wan.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Tsuen Wan.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong has a population of 288,700.

We estimate Tsuen Wan has 17,669 people who might know Jesus, 20,108 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 250,922 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.
